data.fullContent: Although artists of that time used to travel to Paris for further studies, but he chose to travel to Rome where he stayed from 1772 to 1777. He took a side trip to Naples in 1776 with Jens Juel. His ambitions focused in the genre of history painting. While in Rome, he studied Annibale Carracci's frescoes at the Palazzo Farnese and the paintings of Rafael, Titian, and Michelangelo. In addition he studied various other artistic disciplines (sculpture, architecture, decoration, wall paintings) and developed his knowledge of mythology, antiquities, anatomy, and perspective.
data.answer: 虽然当时的艺术家经常去巴黎深造，但他选择去罗马，并在1772年至1777年期间呆在那里。1776年，他和延斯·朱尔顺道去了那不勒斯。他的抱负集中在历史绘画上。在罗马期间，他在法尔内塞宫(Palazzo Farnese)研究安奈贝尔·卡拉契(Annibale Carracci)的壁画，以及拉斐尔、提香和米开朗基罗的画作。此外，他还学习了其他各种艺术学科(雕塑、建筑、装饰、壁画)，并发展了他在神话、古物、解剖学和透视方面的知识。
